[Home](./index.md) &gt; [opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch-dashboards\_utils-common-state\_containers](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.md)

## opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch-dashboards\_utils-common-state\_containers package

State containers are Redux-store-like objects meant to help you manage state in your services or apps. Refer to [guides and examples](https://github.com/elastic/opensearch-dashboards/tree/master/src/plugins/opensearch_dashboard_utils/docs/state_containers) for more info

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createStateContainer(defaultState)](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.createstatecontainer.md) | Creates a state container without transitions and without selectors. |
|  [createStateContainer(defaultState, pureTransitions)](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.createstatecontainer_1.md) | Creates a state container with transitions, but without selectors. |
|  [createStateContainer(defaultState, pureTransitions, pureSelectors, options)](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.createstatecontainer_2.md) | Creates a state container with transitions and selectors. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BaseStateContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.basestatecontainer.md) | Base state container shape without transitions or selectors |
|  [CreateStateContainerOptions](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.createstatecontaineroptions.md) | State container options |
|  [ReduxLikeStateContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.reduxlikestatecontainer.md) | Fully featured state container which matches Redux store interface. Extends [StateContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.statecontainer.md)<!-- -->. Allows to use state container with redux libraries. |
|  [StateContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.statecontainer.md) | Fully featured state container with [Selectors](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.selector.md) and . Extends [BaseStateContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.basestatecontainer.md)<!-- -->. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createStateContainerReactHelpers](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.createstatecontainerreacthelpers.md) | Creates helpers for using [State Containers](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.statecontainer.md) with react Refer to [guide](https://github.com/elastic/opensearch-dashboards/blob/master/src/plugins/opensearch_dashboard_utils/docs/state_containers/react.md) for details |
|  [useContainerSelector](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.usecontainerselector.md) | React hook to apply selector to state container to extract only needed information. Will re-render your component only when the section changes. |
|  [useContainerState](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.usecontainerstate.md) | React hooks that returns the latest state of a [StateContainer](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-plugins-opensearch_dashboard_utils-common-state_containers.statecontainer.md)<!-- -->. |

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
